-replaced link on CLNA by range on Advance ID = 0

-- Reset variables
-- Calc amounts of pending bookings (Internal)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(ACCC_MUTASETTLEMENT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':2' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 and ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :4 for fetch only
select cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTCLNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 and CDEP_TYPE in (1,6,7) for fetch only

Text.val: 24.04 2002 JJ assumming 90%+ of clients receives advances on a single account
client related links are best kept here, covering the condition that there has
to be a default bank (previously link result with single default bank)
... uses for 1. update
Initial amount
If total percentage including this account >= 100
reqamount = rest, else percentage of total to be assigned to this account
-- 1. Update (specified update is missing)
-- 2/3. Update
-- If CLNA_REQAMOUNT < 0 then setCLNA_REQAMOUNT = 0
-- 4. Update (straight loans)
-- 5. Update (credit investment)
-- 6. Update
-- 7. Update
-- 8. Update
-- 9. Update
-- Store CLNA row only if calculated CLNA_REQAMOUNT > 0
-- Deduction of transfer costs (has to be perfomred after storing the CLNA row,
will be selected in GB415)
... reset GB415 output parameters (calculate costs)
... reset GB431 output parameters (calculate vat, based on the calculate costs)
... if CLNA_REQAMOUNT became <= 0 (see task "Update CLNA") delete
created/updated CLNA row and go on with the next client
... in case CLNA_REQAMOUNT became <= 0, the CLNA row has to be deleted
